  as={"h1"}

>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"delete"}
  path={"/agent/{agent_id}/"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Delete an agent. The agent's ID should be provided in the path parameter.
  This will delete the agent and all related data including trades, holdings, and portfolio

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

>
  
</ParamsDetails>

</RequestSchema>
